text: wln trda eank -ayha alrswl- alyahud wala alnasaraa 'illa 'iidha tarakt dynk watbet dynhm. qul lhm: 'iina din al'islam hu aldiyn alshyh. walayin atabaet 'ahwa' hwla' baed aladhi ja'ak min alwhy ma lak eind allah min wly ynfek, wala nasir ynsrk. hdha muajah 'iilaa alammt eamat wa'iin kan khtabana lilnabii salaa allah ealayh wslm
